This vignette gives an introduction and guide to the visual and quantitative capabilities and functions of the ***inferno*** package, for the study of associations, correlations, and links.

See the `vignette('inferno_start')` for an introduction to the package. The present vignette continues with the same example and dataset.

\

# Context: penguins

The `vignette('inferno_start')` focuses on the [`datasets::penguins`] dataset, and shows how to calculate probabilities of single and joint variates from that dataset; also probabilities conditional on given variates. The probabilities 

shows examples of calculations of probabilities and conditional probabilities
